name: Cloud Girl
description:
General


Cloud Girl is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls

Incredible Atmosphere, Great Music, lots of levels with girls art in HD quality.
The game is great for relaxing after a hard day.

Features

  • Several difficulty levels.
  • Relaxing gameplay
  • 5 HD quality art with beautiful girls
  • Pleasant atmosphere.

Game Modes:


  • EASY - 4x4
  • MEDIUM - 4x6
  • ADVANCED - 6x10
  • HARD - 8x14
  • EPIC- 10x16

Thanks to artist - Ivan Peskov, Saigo no Masuta
